hero.subtitle: Aging with Joy
hero.title: Welcome to FunAging Studio
hero.description: A vibrant community where seniors thrive with dignity, health, and happiness. Join us for enriching activities, safe trips, and compassionate care.

features.title: Why Choose FUN?
features.description: We provide comprehensive care and enriching experiences for seniors in a safe and joyful environment.

safety.title: Safety & Security

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?

about.subtitle: Our Story
about.title: About FunAging Studio
about.description: Founded in 2020, FunAging Studio was created with a vision: to transform senior care in Thailand, making it joyful, dignified, and health-oriented.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe aging should be a celebration, not a limitation. At FUN, we empower seniors to maintain independence, health, and happiness through carefully designed activities, safe trips, and compassionate support.
mission.p2: Our team of certified professionals works tirelessly to create an environment where every member feels valued, engaged, and cared for. We partner with families to ensure peace of mind while their loved ones thrive.

different.title: Why We Are Different
different.point1: Senior-Centric Design: Every program, space, and event is designed specifically for senior needs and capabilities.
different.point2: Health Integration: We work with medical professionals to monitor and support each member's wellness journey.
different.point3: Cultural Respect: Thai values of family, respect for elders, and community are at the heart of everything we do.
different.point4: Transparent Communication: Families receive regular updates and can participate in care planning.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: Principles that guide our care and community

care.title: Compassionate Care
care.description: Every member is treated with dignity, respect, and personalized attention by our certified care team.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Comprehensive safety protocols, health monitoring, and emergency response systems ensure complete peace of mind.

community.title: Community Focus
community.description: We foster meaningful connections and social engagement through group activities and shared experiences.

excellence.title: Professional Excellence
excellence.description: Our staff holds certifications in elderly care, first aid, and specialized training for dementia and mobility support.

joy.title: Joy and Dignity
joy.description: We believe aging should be celebrated. Our programs promote happiness, independence, and quality of life.

wellness.title: Holistic Wellness
wellness.description: Physical, mental, and emotional wellness programs designed specifically for senior needs and capabilities.

certification.title: Certifications & Trust
certification.description: FunAging Studio is licensed by the Ministry of Public Health of Thailand and certified by the Thai Elderly Care Association. Our staff undergoes continuous training in safety, health monitoring, and compassionate care practices.

joinNowPage.title: Join FUN Studio
joinNowPage.description: Join the Active Aging family with smart OCR + QR Code system
joinNowPage.methodOcrDesc: Fast, convenient, no typing + Special perks
joinNowPage.methodManualDesc: Type information manually, suitable for those without ID card
joinNowPage.benefit2: Get 10% Discount on your first trip
joinNowPage.benefit4: Access exclusive promotions for VIP members
joinNowPage.benefit5: Digital Membership Card with QR Code
joinNowPage.benefit6: Complete history of trips and activities
joinNowPage.privacyDesc: Your data is encrypted and stored securely according to Thailand's PDPA standards. We never share your personal information with third parties. Used only within our system to provide you with the best service.
joinNowPage.uploadArea: Click to upload or drag and drop file here
joinNowPage.ocrNote: OCR System will automatically read data from ID Card
joinNowPage.verifyNote: System extracted data from your ID card. Please verify accuracy.
